ContentItems.Title: Challenge-01:Build the foundation
ContentItems.Description: The objective of this challenge is to ensure you understand Azure Virtual Networks, Azure connectivity capabilities, and how to establish a hybrid connection to Azure.

ContentItems.Title: Challenge-02:Deploy the first application
ContentItems.Description: The objective of this challenge is to ensure you understand how to design a network architecture that enables organizations to start as small as needed and scale alongside their business requirements.

ContentItems.Title: Challenge-03:Design and implement network security
ContentItems.Description: The objective of this challenge is to ensure you understand how to translate network security requirements into solutions.

ContentItems.Title: Challenge-04:Design and implement web application security
ContentItems.Description: The objective of this challenge is to ensure you understand how to integrate solutions into your design as it begins to scale.

ContentItems.Title: Challenge-05:CMC goes global
ContentItems.Description: The objective of this challenge is to ensure you understand how to integrate multiple regions into your design as it begins to scale.

ContentItems.Title: Challenge-06:Secure access to Azure PaaS services
ContentItems.Description: The objective of this challenge is to demonstrate your understanding of PaaS and DNS services available in Azure and how they can be securely integrated into a virtual network.

ContentItems.Title: Challenge-07:Integrating name resolution between Azure and on-premises
ContentItems.Description: The objective of this challenge is to understand how to manage and integrate your private DNS on-premises and in Azure.

ContentItems.Title: Challenge-08:Centrally manage Azure Virtual Networks at scale
ContentItems.Description: The objective of this challenge is to understand how to achieve network management and security at scale.

ContentItems.Title: Challenge-09:Retrospective - Looking back
ContentItems.Description: The objective of this challenge is to reflect on design decisions and analyze the pros and cons of your solutions.
